title: r/Prorevenge Spoiled Rich Girl Steals My Homework, So I Get Her Expelled!
description:
r/Prorevenge In today's story, an entitled rich girl thinks that daddy can just buy her way through college, so she slacks off and hardly does any work. She even steals OP's homework and tries to pass it off as her own. OP is having absolutely none of that, so she lays a very clever trap where the spoiled girl reveals herself as a complete fraud in front of the professor and the entire class! If you like this podcast and you want to see more, hit the follow button for daily Reddit content!
